desc:
Weather extension for Chrome. Written on TypeScript and React.
Features: Languages support: Ru/En, Animated chart, Geolocation, 50 hours of detailed weather information: [temperature, humidity, precipitation, wind]
Mario game using HTML5 Canvas. Still under development. But first 2 levels available! Play HERE
Plugin for WEBPACK. Main feature is to make external-script as inline-script. Used by at least 16 PEOPLE according to dependency graph
A tiny tool written on Node.js for reading wav-file. Analyses specific bytes and returns object with data
A tiny tool written on Node.js for (re)generating Chrome extension from React & Webpack project
